name: DoubleGreen Loan
description: This loan programs offers interest-free loans for measures that make homes more energy-efficient, including insulation and HVAC equipment.

name: Self Help Energy Saver Loans
description: Self-Help's Energy Saver Loans help homeowners finance energy-efficient upgrades such as insulation, HVAC systems, and solar panels. The program offers affordable financing to improve home comfort and reduce energy bills.

description_langs.es: Los Préstamos para Ahorradores de Energía de Self-Help ayudan a los propietarios a financiar mejoras energéticamente eficientes como aislamiento, sistemas HVAC y paneles solares. El programa ofrece financiamiento asequible para mejorar la comodidad del hogar y reducir las facturas de energía.

financial_authority.description: Self-Help Credit Union was chartered in 1983 to build a network of branches that partner with working families and communities often underserved by the financial marketplace. With over $1.86 billion in assets and serving more than 89,000 members in 37 branches – eight in Florida, one in Georgia, 23 in North Carolina, four in South Carolina, and one in Virginia - Self-Help Credit Union is one of the fastest-growing community development financial institutions in the country. It is part of the Self-Help family of nonprofit organizations whose collective mission is to create and protect ownership and economic opportunity for all. For over 40 years, the national Center for Community Self-Help and its affiliates have provided more than $11 billion in financing to help more than 168,000 borrowers buy homes, start and grow businesses and strengthen community resources. For more information, please visit www.self-help.org.
financial_authority.name: Self-Help Credit Union

name: Motor Systems, Irrigation or Water Systems, Compressed-air Systems, Energy-storage Devices, and EV Chargers Loan

name: Electric Vehicle Loans
description: Self-Help Credit Union offers Electric Vehicle Loans to help individuals purchase new or used electric vehicles. The program supports clean transportation by providing affordable financing options with flexible terms and competitive interest rates. Loans are available for both new and used EVs, and refinancing options are also offered. All SHCU members can get a 0.25% discount on an EV or PHEV (plug-in hybrid electric vehicle).  For a limited time only, qualifying members with modest incomes (below 80% area median income) can access a deeper rate discount on EVs and PHEVs.

description_langs.es: Self-Help Credit Union ofrece Préstamos para Vehículos Eléctricos para ayudar a las personas a comprar vehículos eléctricos nuevos o usados. El programa apoya el transporte limpio al proporcionar opciones de financiamiento asequibles con términos flexibles y tasas de interés competitivas. Los préstamos están disponibles tanto para vehículos eléctricos nuevos como usados, y también se ofrecen opciones de refinanciamiento.

financial_authority.description: Self-Help Credit Union was chartered in 1983 to build a network of branches that partner with working families and communities often underserved by the financial marketplace. With over $1.86 billion in assets and serving more than 89,000 members in 37 branches – eight in Florida, one in Georgia, 23 in North Carolina, four in South Carolina, and one in Virginia - Self-Help Credit Union is one of the fastest-growing community development financial institutions in the country. It is part of the Self-Help family of nonprofit organizations whose collective mission is to create and protect ownership and economic opportunity for all. For over 40 years, the national Center for Community Self-Help and its affiliates have provided more than $11 billion in financing to help more than 168,000 borrowers buy homes, start and grow businesses and strengthen community resources. For more information, please visit www.self-help.org.
financial_authority.name: Self-Help Credit Union

name: NH Electric Co-Op On Bill Financing
description: This loan program offers NH Electric Co-Op members financing for home energy improvements projects.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ofrece a los miembros de NH Electric Co-Op financiamiento para proyectos de mejoras energéticas en el hogar.

financial_authority.description: The New Hampshire Electric Co-Op is an electric utility which offers Home Energy Performance Loans for members to finance qualified energy efficiency measures.
financial_authority.name: New Hampshire Electric Co-Op

name: NH Electric Co-Op Third Party Financing
description: NHEC provides interest subsidies through participating banks and credit unions to finance Home Energy Performance project loans.

description_langs.es: NHEC ofrece subsidios de intereses a través de bancos y cooperativas de crédito participantes para financiar préstamos para proyectos de rendimiento energético del hogar.

financial_authority.description: The New Hampshire Electric Co-Op is an electric utility which offers Home Energy Performance Loans for members to finance qualified energy efficiency measures.
financial_authority.name: New Hampshire Electric Co-Op

name: NHSaves Energy Efficiency Loan
description: The NH Save Heat Loan is a 0% interest loan program offered by Eastern Bank in partnership with NHSaves, designed to help New Hampshire residents finance energy efficiency improvements in their homes.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo NH Save Heat es un programa de préstamo con 0 % de interés ofrecido por Eastern Bank en asociación con NHSaves, diseñado para ayudar a los residentes de New Hampshire a financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética en sus hogares.

financial_authority.description: Eastern Bank offers energy efficiency loans for customers looking to make energy efficient upgrades at home.
financial_authority.name: Eastern Bank

name: New Hampshire Clean Energy Fund
description: The New Hampshire Clean Energy Fund offers low-interest loans to help residents finance clean energy improvements such as heat pump and battery storage installations.

description_langs.es: El Fondo de Energía Limpia de New Hampshire ofrece préstamos a bajo interés para ayudar a los residentes a financiar mejoras de energía limpia, como instalaciones de bombas de calor y almacenamiento de baterías.

financial_authority.description: Eversource is a utility that offers New Hampshire customers 0% APR loans for qualifying energy efficiency projects.
financial_authority.name: Eversource

name: HVAC Loan
description: RESP can finance the installation of air-source and geothermal heating and cooling.

description_langs.es: RESP puede financiar la instalación de calefacción y refrigeración geotérmica y de aire.

financial_authority.description: North Arkansas Electric Cooperative, Inc. (NAEC) offers Rural Energy Savings Program (RESP) loans to help members finance energy efficiency improvements.
financial_authority.name: North Arkansas Electric Cooperative, Inc.

name: On- or Off-grid Renewable Energy Systems Loan
description: Loans are available for on- or off-grid renewable energy systems installed by Today’s Power Inc., subject to inspection and interconnection requirements, with additional processing time for solar installations.

description_langs.es: Los préstamos están disponibles para sistemas de energía renovable conectados o fuera de la red instalados por Today's Power Inc., sujetos a requisitos de inspección e interconexión, con tiempo de procesamiento adicional para instalaciones solares.

financial_authority.description: North Arkansas Electric Cooperative, Inc. (NAEC) offers Rural Energy Savings Program (RESP) loans to help members finance energy efficiency improvements.
financial_authority.name: North Arkansas Electric Cooperative, Inc.

name: Energy Efficient Loan Program
description: The Energy Efficient Loan Program enables Southern Rivers Energy members to finance energy-efficient home improvements including HVAC, water heater, and weatherization installations.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos para Eficiencia Energética permite a los miembros de Southern Rivers Energy financiar mejoras energéticamente eficientes en el hogar, incluidas instalaciones de HVAC, calentadores de agua y climatización.

financial_authority.description: Southern Rivers Energy is a touchstone energy cooperative and utility that offers loans for energy-efficient home improvements.
financial_authority.name: Southern Rivers Energy

name: MHFA Home Energy Loan
description: This loan program offers loans for Minnesota homeowners to make energy efficient home improvements including HVAC, water heater, and weatherization upgrades.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ofrece préstamos a propietarios de viviendas de Minnesota para realizar mejoras energéticamente eficientes en el hogar, incluidas mejoras en HVAC, calentador de agua y climatización.

financial_authority.description: The Minnesota Housing Finance Agency (MHFA) offers home energy loans for Minnesota homeowners to make energy efficient improvements to their homes.
financial_authority.name: Minnesota Housing Finance Agency

name: TMLP SAVES
description: The TMLP SAVES program offers 0% interest loans to residential customers of Taunton Municipal Lighting Plant for energy efficiency improvements, including insulation, heating systems, and ENERGY STAR® appliances.

description_langs.es: El programa TMLP SAVES ofrece préstamos sin interés a clientes residenciales de Taunton Municipal Lighting Plant para mejoras de eficiencia energética, incluyendo aislamiento, sistemas de calefacción y electrodomésticos ENERGY STAR®.

financial_authority.description: TMLP is a utility which offers heat pump and zero-interest residential loans for energy efficient improvements.
financial_authority.name: Taunton Municipal Lighting Plant

name: Energy Loans
description: This loan program offers affordable financing for energy efficiency and renewable energy improvements for homes and businesses in Vermont. The loan can be used for weatherization, heating system upgrades, solar installations, and other energy-saving projects.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ofrece financiamiento asequible para mejoras de eficiencia energética y energía renovable en hogares y negocios de Vermont. El préstamo puede utilizarse para climatización, mejoras en el sistema de calefacción, instalaciones solares y otros proyectos de ahorro energético.

financial_authority.description: NeighborWorks is a nonprofit organization which offers residential energy efficiency loans.
financial_authority.name: NeighborWorks of Western Vermont

name: Efficiency Home Improvement Loan
description: The Efficiency Home Improvement Loan from Vermont Federal Credit Union offers low-interest financing for energy-efficient home upgrades, including weatherization, heating and cooling systems, and renewable energy installations. The program is available to Vermont residents and supports projects that improve home energy efficiency.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo para Mejoras de Eficiencia en el Hogar de Vermont Federal Credit Union ofrece financiamiento a bajo interés para mejoras energéticamente eficientes en el hogar, incluyendo climatización, sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración, e instalaciones de energía renovable. El programa está disponible para residentes de Vermont y respalda proyectos que mejoran la eficiencia energética del hogar.

financial_authority.description: Vermont Federal Credit Union offers energy efficiency loans for customers to make efficient home improvements.
financial_authority.name: Vermont Federal Credit Union

name: Heat Pump Financing Program
description: The Heat Pump Financing Program provides loans for the installation of energy-efficient heat pumps, helping customers reduce energy costs and improve home comfort.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Financiamiento de Bombas de Calor ofrece préstamos para la instalación de bombas de calor energéticamente eficientes, ayudando a los clientes a reducir los costos de energía y mejorar la comodidad del hogar.

financial_authority.description: Volunteer Energy Cooperative offers financing for energy-efficient heat pumps to help customers reduce energy consumption and improve home comfort.
financial_authority.name: Volunteer Energy Cooperative

name: Zero Percent Loan Program
description: The Zero Percent Loan Program provides interest-free loans to help residents of San Mateo County and the City of Los Banos electrify their homes with energy-efficient upgrades, including heat pump water heaters, heat pump HVAC systems, electric vehicle chargers, and more.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos al Cero Por Ciento ofrece préstamos sin intereses para ayudar a los residentes del condado de San Mateo y la ciudad de Los Banos a electrificar sus hogares con mejoras energéticamente eficientes, incluidos calentadores de agua con bomba de calor, sistemas HVAC con bomba de calor, cargadores de vehículos eléctricos y más.

financial_authority.description: Peninsula Clean Energy offers a Zero Percent Loan Program to help residents electrify their homes with energy-efficient upgrades.
financial_authority.name: Peninsula Clean Energy

name: Solar PV System Loan
description: This loan program helps finance the installation of solar photovoltaic (PV) systems, which generate electricity from sunlight to power homes.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ayuda a financiar la instalación de sistemas fotovoltaicos (PV) solares, que generan electricidad a partir de la luz solar para alimentar los hogares.

financial_authority.description: Clean Energy Credit Union offers loans for clean energy projects, including solar installations, energy-efficient heating and cooling systems, and more.
financial_authority.name: Clean Energy Credit Union

name: Heat Pump Program
description: Caney Fork Electric Cooperative offers an on-bill Heat Pump Program that provides financing for the installation of energy-efficient heat pumps. The program allows qualified members to finance the cost of a new heat pump system through their electric bill, with no down payment required and competitive interest rates. Payments are added to the member's monthly bill.

description_langs.es: Caney Fork Electric Cooperative ofrece un Programa de Bombas de Calor que proporciona financiamiento para la instalación de bombas de calor energéticamente eficientes. El programa permite a los miembros calificados financiar el costo de un nuevo sistema de bomba de calor a través de su factura eléctrica, sin pago inicial y con tasas de interés competitivas.

name: Renewable Energy Resource Loan
description: The Renewable Energy Resource Loan offers financing for solar voltaic (PV), wind, micro-hydro, and biomass generation.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Recursos de Energía Renovable ofrece financiamiento para la generación de energía solar fotovoltaica (PV), eólica, microhidroeléctrica y de biomasa.

financial_authority.description: Santee Cooper offers loans to help customers finance energy efficiency improvements, including HVAC systems, water heaters, solar, and more.
financial_authority.name: Santee Cooper

name: Investment Tax Credit (ITC) Loan
description: The Investment Tax Credit (ITC) Loan is designed to finance projects that qualify for tax credits, such as solar, geothermal, home battery storage, and more.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Crédito Fiscal a la Inversión (ITC) está diseñado para financiar proyectos que califiquen para créditos fiscales, como solar, geotérmica, almacenamiento de baterías para el hogar y más.

financial_authority.description: EastRise Credit Union offers green loans with discounted rates based on household income.
financial_authority.name: EastRise Credit Union

name: Mitchell EMC PowerUp Lending Program
description: This loan program helps Mitchell EMC members finance energy-efficient home upgrades or repairs, including HVAC systems, roofing, generators, solar panels, and windows.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ayuda a los miembros de Mitchell EMC a financiar mejoras o reparaciones de viviendas energéticamente eficientes, incluidos sistemas HVAC, techos, generadores, paneles solares y ventanas.

financial_authority.description: Mitchell EMC is a utility corporation which partners with Go Energy Credit Union to provide loans to finance energy-efficient home upgrades.
financial_authority.name: Mitchell EMC

name: Energy Smart Loans
description: Energy Smart Loans are designed to help homeowners finance energy-efficient home improvements such as solar, heating, cooling, and weatherization projects.

description_langs.es: Los préstamos Energy Smart están diseñados para ayudar a los propietarios a financiar mejoras energéticas en el hogar, como proyectos de energía solar, calefacción, refrigeración y climatización.

financial_authority.description: Puget Sound Cooperative Credit Union offers the Energy Smart Loans program to help homeowners finance energy-efficient home improvements.
financial_authority.name: Puget Sound Cooperative Credit Union

name: Energy Improvement Loan
description: This verstile loan offers financing for solar, efficient heating and cooling systems, weatherization, home energy efficiency upgrades, and commuter and e-bikes.

description_langs.es: Este préstamo versátil ofrece financiamiento para solar, sistemas de calefacción y refrigeración eficientes, climatización, mejoras de eficiencia energética en el hogar, y bicicletas de transporte y eléctricas.

financial_authority.description: EastRise Credit Union offers green loans with discounted rates based on household income.
financial_authority.name: EastRise Credit Union

name: Heat Pump Loan
description: The Heat Pump Loan Program offers loans to WRECC members for the installation of energy-efficient heat pumps. Loan payments are added to the WRECC bill each month.

description_langs.es: El Programa de Préstamos para Bombas de Calor ofrece préstamos a los miembros de WRECC para la instalación de bombas de calor energéticamente eficientes.

financial_authority.description: Warren Rural Electric Cooperative Corporation (WRECC) offers financing for the installation of energy-efficient heat pumps.
financial_authority.name: Warren Rural Electric Cooperative Corporation (WRECC)

name: 20-Year Energy Improvement Loan
description: The 20-Year Energy Improvement Loan offers financing for solar technology, high-efficiency heating systems, and other energy upgrades.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Mejora Energética de 20 Años ofrece financiamiento para tecnología solar, sistemas de calefacción de alta eficiencia y otras mejoras energéticas.

financial_authority.description: EastRise Credit Union offers green loans with discounted rates based on household income.
financial_authority.name: EastRise Credit Union

name: Habersham EMC Energy Efficiency Loan Program
description: This loan program allows HEMC customers to finance energy efficient home improvements including heat pump, water heater, and weatherization installations.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos permite a los clientes de HEMC financiar mejoras energéticamente eficientes en el hogar, incluidas instalaciones de bombas de calor, calentadores de agua y climatización.

financial_authority.description: Habersham EMC is a Touchstone Energy Cooperative and utility that offers loans for customers to make energy efficient upgrades.
financial_authority.name: Habersham EMC

name: Heat Pump Financing
description: Blue Ridge Mountain EMC provides financing for heat pumps to help members improve energy efficiency in their homes. The loan program offers affordable monthly payments and is available to qualifying members.

description_langs.es: Blue Ridge Mountain EMC ofrece financiamiento para bombas de calor para ayudar a los miembros a mejorar la eficiencia energética en sus hogares. El programa ofrece pagos mensuales asequibles y está disponible para miembros que califiquen.

financial_authority.description: Blue Ridge Mountain EMC offers financing for heat pumps to help members improve energy efficiency in their homes.
financial_authority.name: Blue Ridge Mountain Electric Membership Corporation

name: KEEP Home Energy Loan
description: This loan offers Pennsylvanians financing for improvements that make their homes more energy efficient, such as HVAC, weatherization, and water heater installations.

financial_authority.description: The National Energy Improvement Fund is a for-profit benefit corporation that offers loans for energy efficient home improvements.
financial_authority.name: National Energy Improvement Fund

name: Energy-Efficiency Financing
description: This loan program offers financings and on-bill repayment for energy efficient improvements including HVAC, weatherization, and appliance upgrades.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ofrece financiamiento y pago en factura para mejoras de eficiencia energética que incluyen HVAC, climatización y actualizaciones de electrodomésticos.

financial_authority.description: Avista is an energy provider which offers loans for residential energy efficiency improvements.
financial_authority.name: Avista Corporation

name: Self-Help Credit Union Solar Loans
description: Self-Help Credit Union offers solar loans to help homeowners finance the installation of solar energy systems. These loans are designed to make clean energy more accessible and affordable, with flexible terms and competitive interest rates. The program supports residential solar projects and aims to promote environmental sustainability.

description_langs.es: Self-Help Credit Union ofrece préstamos solares para ayudar a los propietarios a financiar la instalación de sistemas de energía solar. Estos préstamos están diseñados para hacer que la energía limpia sea más accesible y asequible, con términos flexibles y tasas de interés competitivas. El programa apoya proyectos solares residenciales y tiene como objetivo promover la sostenibilidad ambiental.

financial_authority.description: Self-Help Credit Union was chartered in 1983 to build a network of branches that partner with working families and communities often underserved by the financial marketplace. With over $1.86 billion in assets and serving more than 89,000 members in 37 branches – eight in Florida, one in Georgia, 23 in North Carolina, four in South Carolina, and one in Virginia - Self-Help Credit Union is one of the fastest-growing community development financial institutions in the country. It is part of the Self-Help family of nonprofit organizations whose collective mission is to create and protect ownership and economic opportunity for all. For over 40 years, the national Center for Community Self-Help and its affiliates have provided more than $11 billion in financing to help more than 168,000 borrowers buy homes, start and grow businesses and strengthen community resources. For more information, please visit www.self-help.org.
financial_authority.name: Self-Help Credit Union

name: Homeowners Energy Efficiency Loan Program
description: This loan program offers loans up to $10,000 for energy efficiency repairs including HVAC replacements. Persons below 80% AMI are eligible.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ofrece préstamos de hasta $10,000 para reparaciones de eficiencia energética, incluyendo reemplazo de sistemas de climatización (HVAC). Las personas con un ingreso medio anual (AMI) inferior al 80% son elegibles.

financial_authority.description: The PHFA is a state-affiliated agency that offers loans for energy efficient home upgrades.
financial_authority.name: PA Housing Finance Agency

name: Energy Efficiency Loans
description: This loan program offers Lewis County residents financing for energy efficient home improvements, such as HVAC or weatherization upgrades.

description_langs.es: Este programa de préstamos ofrece a los residentes del condado de Lewis financiamiento para mejoras energéticamente eficientes en el hogar, como mejoras de HVAC o climatización.

financial_authority.description: Lewis County offers energy efficiency loans for its residents.
financial_authority.name: Lewis County Public Utility District

name: Home Energy Green Loan
description: The Home Energy Green Loan from EastRise Credit Union helps homeowners finance energy-efficient upgrades such as weatherization, cold climate heat pumps, solar hot water systems, and more.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo Verde de Energía para el Hogar de EastRise Credit Union ayuda a los propietarios a financiar mejoras energéticamente eficientes como la climatización, bombas de calor para climas fríos, sistemas solares de agua caliente y más.

financial_authority.description: EastRise Credit Union offers green loans with discounted rates based on household income.
financial_authority.name: EastRise Credit Union

name: Energy Efficiency Loan
description: The Energy Efficiency Loan offers financing to help customers finance energy efficiency improvements, including HVAC systems, water heaters, and more.

description_langs.es: El Préstamo de Eficiencia Energética ofrece financiamiento para ayudar a los clientes a financiar mejoras de eficiencia energética, incluidos sistemas HVAC, calentadores de agua y más.

financial_authority.description: Santee Cooper offers loans to help customers finance energy efficiency improvements, including HVAC systems, water heaters, solar, and more.
